articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Google’s Pixel Foldis here to take on Samsung’s Galaxy Z Fold 4
articles.description: Google has finally unveiled the Pixel Fold, its first foldable phone, at Google I/O 2023. The device features a 5.8-inch outer display and a 7.6-inch inner display, and it’s powered by Google’s Tensor G2 chip. The Pixel Fold also has a triple rear camera system and a 4,821mAh battery.

articles.author: Jon Fingas
articles.title: Google's Pixel Fold is official, costs $1,799
articles.description: Google has officially unveiled its long-rumored Pixel Fold. The foldable phone will start at $1,799 when it ships in June, and it's meant to directly challenge Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 4 with a book-style design and a focus on software features.
